metadata.title: USN-6643-1 -- NPM IP vulnerability
metadata.description: Emre Durmaz discovered that NPM IP package incorrectly distinguished between private and public IP addresses. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6643-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-ip - 2.0.0+~1.1.0-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
